import { useState } from "react" import {useLogInUserMutation} from '../../features/userApi' const LogIn = ()=>{ const [user,setUser] = useState({ email:'', password:'' }) const loginApi = useLogInUserMutation() const submitHandel = (e) => { e.preventDefault() loginApi(user) } return (
Registration
setUser({...user,email:e.target.value})} />
setUser({...user,password:e.target.value})} />
) } export default LogIn
